post.text: So nice - great Americans outside Trump Tower right now. Thank you! (Sorry I am not there - just landed in Arizona!)

comment.author: Cheyenne
comment.text: Awesome that was today and New York City keeping the hope to make America even better than what it is and God willing the name of the Lord Jesus Christ it will happen

replies.author: Zeth
replies.text: Surprise, Surprise, Donald Trump's Supporters Are Trying To 'Rig' The Election Supporters have been violent, admitted to voter fraud and racial profiling, just as Trump foresaw.
